The LFI indicator methodology was first applied in the North Sea (Greenstreet et al., 2011) and has subsequently been adapted to expand the indicator to the Celtic Seas (Shephard et al., 2011), Bay of Biscay and Iberian Coast (Modica et al., 2014) and Wider Atlantic (Mindel et al., 2018). Studies within the Mediterranean Sea have also demonstrated the applicability of the indicator (Bitetto et al., 2019).
